articles.title: GLP-1 Analogues Market 2032: Healthy CAGR and Business Strategy, Industry Demand, Growth, Share, Trends and ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Novo Nordisk A/S is a key player in the GLP-1 Analogue market. The company's product portfolio includes flagship products Ozempic and Wegovy.

articles.title: Top 10 washing machines for 2025: Best deals on Hisense, Haier, LG, Bosch, and more
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: Several companies including Hisense, Haier, LG, Bosch, Kogan, Devanti, Fisher & Paykel, Miele, and Electrolux offer new washing machines with advanced features. These include features like Pure Jet Wash (Hisense), UV Protect technology (Haier), AI Direct Drive (LG), HygieneCare program (Bosch) and UltraMix Technology (Electrolux). The machines come in various sizes and capacities, targeting different consumer needs and preferences with innovative technologies and functionalities.

articles.title: Just Eat issues warning to customers to update app over new order rules
articles.author: Hana Carter
articles.summary: Just Eat is introducing new product offerings, including lingerie and sex toys through a partnership with Lovehoney, delivered discreetly in unbranded packaging.  Furthermore, Just Eat is implementing a new app update requiring customers purchasing age-restricted items like alcohol and tobacco to provide photo ID for age verification upon delivery.

articles.title: What's the ‘dirty soda' trend? Find out in Newport Beach
articles.author: Brock Keeling
articles.summary: Kickstand Soda Shop, owned by Mike Hancock, has opened in Newport Beach, offering a variety of "dirty sodas." The shop features customized beverages like the Surf's Up and Paddle Board, and plans to expand to other locations. The Kickstand also creates a special drink of the month, with February's dirty soda being a Valentine's Day-forward Sunkissed Chocolate.

articles.title: Let Valentino and Dream Baby Press Define Your Relationship
articles.author: Brooke La Mantia
articles.summary: Valentino collaborated with Dream Baby Press to launch a holiday-series featuring customized love poems. Six writers, including Jemima Kirke and Brontez Purnell, created poems available for customization online or in stores. The poems are part of a special product offering for Valentine's Day.

articles.title: Best whipped cream dispenser
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Otis Classic introduces the 304 Stainless Steel Whipped Cream Dispenser, emphasizing its durability and user-friendly design with food-grade stainless steel and three decorating nozzles. EurKitchen offers the Professional Aluminum Whipped Cream Dispenser, highlighting its lightweight design and versatility, including seltzer making. ICO presents the Professional Aluminum Whipped Cream Dispenser as a budget-friendly option with a consistent gas stream for uniform whipped cream.

articles.title: Samsung Keyboard just got a lot smarter about replying to WhatsApp messages
articles.author: Chandraveer Mathur
articles.summary: Samsung launched a new AI-powered reply suggestion feature for its Galaxy S25 series. This feature, available through the Samsung Keyboard app, provides context-aware reply suggestions in messaging apps like WhatsApp using on-device AI models. The feature aims to offer more helpful and relevant suggestions compared to previous implementations.

articles.title: Amazon knocked $75 off the Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe so you can kick your Dunkin' habit
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: De'Longhi offers the Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe Coffee and Espresso Maker, priced at $174 on Amazon (originally $249). This machine features one-button operation and brews various cup sizes, including espresso and coffee. It also allows users to sample different Nespresso capsules.

articles.title: Amazon knocked $75 off the Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe so you can kick your Dunkin' habit
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: The Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi is on sale at Amazon for $174. The machine features one-button operation, a 40-ounce water reservoir, and various brewing options, including espresso, coffee, and iced coffee. It also includes a free box of Nespresso capsules for sampling.

articles.title: Powerhouse weed vaporizer will blow your stoner mind
articles.author: Greenstate Staff
articles.summary: Arizer has introduced the V-Tower vaporizer, a tabletop device designed for both beginners and experienced cannabis users. The V-Tower, known for its user-friendly design and digital display, supports both dry herbs and concentrates and features a wide temperature range with rapid heating. It is recognized for its high-quality components and great functionality.

articles.title: China's X factor: Xpeng arrives in Ireland with €42k electric G6 SUV
articles.author: Neil Briscoe
articles.summary: Xpeng launched its G6 electric SUV in Ireland, offering two versions: a standard rear-wheel drive model and a long-range version. The company plans to introduce further models, including the G9 mid-size SUV and the X7+ saloon, and is developing innovative vehicles like the Land Aircraft Carrier.

articles.title: T-Mobile customers can get still get a new Galaxy S25 series phone for free. How to qualify
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models, which are now available for purchase. T-Mobile offers promotions such as trade-in bonuses and deals for Go5G Plus and Business Unlimited Advanced plans, making the new phones more accessible to consumers. The Galaxy S25 series features advancements in camera technology, display quality, and processor performance.

articles.title: We'll Give You $25 For Your Thoughts On BuzzFeed's A.I. Generators
articles.author: Abigail Whittington
articles.summary: BuzzFeed is conducting a research study to gather user feedback on its existing A.I. generators, including the Celebrity Emoji Generator, Lego Pet Generator, and Erewhon Smoothie Generator. The company seeks insights for future content generation tools and offers a $25 gift card for participation.

articles.title: This Back-Saving Electric Spin Scrubber Is Under $24 For A Limited Time
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: An electric spin scrubber is on sale for Prime members. It features a retractable pole, multiple brush types, adjustable speeds, and a 90-minute battery life. Reviewers highlight its effectiveness and ease of use for cleaning various surfaces.

articles.title: Nextuple Inc. Announces the Launch of OnePint.ai: Revolutionizing Inventory Management with AI, Autonomous Decision-Making, and Simulations
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Nextuple Inc. has launched OnePint.ai, a new software company providing an AI-driven inventory management platform. OnePint.ai aims to improve forecast accuracy, reduce fulfillment costs, and increase sales for brands, retailers, and grocers by integrating inventory planning, execution, and exception management using AI, autonomous decision-making, and advanced simulations.

articles.title: Valentine's Day gifts with next day delivery
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Rihanna's Fenty lingerie Valentine's Day collection is available starting from £8. Marc Jacobs offers Daisy Ever So Fresh Perfume, originally £92, now at a 50% discount for £46. Finisterre features a Merino wool crew neck jumper for £125. Amazon provides a Roses, champagne, and chocolate gift set for £49.99.

articles.title: NUAIR Defense Launches, Delivering Real-World Solutions to Accelerate Defense Readiness
articles.author: Nuair
articles.summary: NUAIR announced the launch of NUAIR Defense, a new hub for verifying, validating, fielding, and training of next-generation defense capabilities across air, land, maritime, and multi-domain spaces. NUAIR Defense aims to offer a streamlined, collaborative approach to mission-ready technology and operators.

articles.title: This $14 Design Essentials shampoo is a staple in my haircare routine
articles.summary: Design Essentials launched Honey Creme Shampoo which cleanses, conditions, and detangles all hair types and textures. The cruelty-free formula is free of parabens, silicones, mineral oils and petrolatum, and restores moisture leaving hair silky, soft, and moisturized.

articles.title: Hand Dryer Market Set to Surpass Valuation of US$ 4,054.5 Million By 2033
articles.summary: Several companies, including Dyson, Excel Dryer, Mitsubishi Electric, and World Dryer, are innovating in the hand dryer market. These companies focus on new features such as HEPA filtration systems and antimicrobial coatings. The new tech aims to address hygiene concerns and enhance user experience through quieter operation and touchless technology in high-speed hand dryers.

articles.title: Good enough to bathe in? Papa Johns unveils Garlic Dipping Sauce-inspired bath bomb
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Papa John's has launched a limited-edition bath bomb inspired by its garlic dipping sauce. Starting Feb. 11, select fans who share their love for Papa John's garlic dipping sauce on social media may be surprised with the bath bomb. Additionally, Papa Johns is offering customers the choice to order a heart-shaped pizza from Feb. 10-16.

articles.title: Amazon Deals of the Day: The 2024 Ring Battery Doorbell Is Back to Its Lowest ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Shokz OpenRun Pro headphones and Ninja BL770 Mega blender are currently available with a 25% discount.

articles.title: Council Post: 20 Ways To Get Clients Excited About Your App
articles.author: Expert Panel®
articles.summary: The article compiles strategies from various finance executives for launching and promoting new account management apps. Companies are advised to focus on highlighting the app's value by emphasizing ease of use, time-saving features, and personalized experiences. Incentives such as rewards, exclusive access to features, and personalized onboarding are suggested to drive adoption and engagement.

articles.title: Napkin AI's ‘design agency' of AI agents is changing how professionals create graphics
articles.summary: Napkin AI launched a graphic design tool that generates graphics from text inputs in seconds, targeting professionals who need visuals for presentations and documents.  Napkin AI differs from existing solutions using AI agents for design tasks and allowing easy customization of generated graphics. The company is introducing a new 'styling' agent and planning to expand the catalog of illustrations.

articles.title: Google's Circle to Search update enhances long-press activation & vibration feedback
articles.author: Bryan M. Wolfe
articles.summary: Google is rolling out a software update for its "Circle to Search" feature, enhancing it with a more prominent vibration pattern for activation. The update, currently available on Pixel devices, includes a new "Get Game Help" feature and interface changes like adding a search bar, song lookup, and translate shortcut. The goal is to improve user experience and reduce accidental triggers.

articles.title: Built on Bluesky, Pinksky brings its Instagram-like app to Android
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Pinksky launched an Android version of its photo-centric social networking app. Pinksky is built on top of Bluesky. Pinksky aims to attract former Instagram users.

articles.title: How Full Mouth Toothbrushes Can Improve Your Dental Health
articles.author: Editor
org: Every Day Times of San Diego
articles.summary: The full mouth toothbrush, featuring a U-shaped head, is designed for comprehensive teeth cleaning, reducing brushing time and addressing common issues like uneven pressure. Smart versions integrate with mobile apps for personalized feedback, progress tracking, and reminders. These toothbrushes are designed with accessibility in mind, including ergonomic handles and single-button operation for users with limited dexterity.

articles.title: Is Framework Teasing New 2-In-1 Laptops And A Future Gaming Device?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Framework announced a live event. Framework will unveil multiple new products during the event. Framework dropped clues suggesting upcoming products.

articles.title: Top money-saving products you need
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of products intended to replace expensive services and save consumers money.  It features items such as espresso machines as an alternative to cafes, heated round brushes to skip salon visits, and walking treadmills for at-home workouts, along with hair and laundry care products from Renpure and Saje Natural. The article showcases the products features and the impact for the users.

articles.title: Kanye West's Yeezy: Innovation or Controversy in 2025?
articles.summary: Yeezy introduced a new pricing model, making all products available for $20. They are also launching the YZY BL-01 'Bully' shoe. The company ran a Super Bowl ad to promote Yeezy.com.

articles.title: Ninja's new ice cream machine delivers soft serve and hard scoops
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Ninja has announced the Ninja Swirl, a new ice cream maker capable of producing both scooped ice cream and soft serve, expanding upon the original Creami's capabilities. The Swirl is priced at $349.99 and can also create frozen yogurt, custard, non-dairy ice creams, and high-protein variants.

articles.title: Best Valentine's Day flowers you can have delivered last minute
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Bloom and Wild offers stylish flower delivery with letterbox options and personalized bouquets. Marks and Spencer provides categorized bouquets and plants with convenient delivery options. Prestige Flowers features discounted Valentine's Day bouquets with add-ons and simplified browsing. Serenata Flowers offers free next-day delivery with popular bouquets. FlowerBx specializes in single-stem bouquets with cut-to-order quality, while Bunches provides affordable arrangements with next-day delivery. Interflora works with national and international florists, offering customizable bouquets.

articles.title: My In-Shower Moisturizing Manifesto
articles.author: Tembe Denton-Hurst
articles.summary: Naturium Hydrating Body Wash is a light, slippery cleanser that leaves skin moisturized. NÉcessaire body wash has a luxurious, thick feel and contains vitamins C and E, along with niacinamide. Flamingo razor has two moisturizing pads that hug the razor.

articles.title: Immediate Alpha Trustpilot-{Is Immediate Alpha A Scam}-Read All Honor Reviews By EXPERIENCES Trader !
articles.summary: Immediate Alpha launches a new trading platform that offers advanced analytics, smart trading tools, and a user-friendly design. Key features include customizable trading algorithms, risk management systems, real-time market data, and a mobile trading app for on-the-go access. The platform supports trading various assets, including stocks, forex, commodities, and indices.

articles.title: Katy Perry's £40 perfume gets Amazon price drop ahead of Valentine's Day
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 57% discount on Katy Perry's Royal Revolution Eau de Parfum, pricing it at £17.80 for a 100ml bottle. Boots has reduced the price of Britney Spears' Fantasy perfume to £24.50, and Superdrug is selling Ariana Grande's Sweet Like Candy for £26.50. These promotions provide opportunities to purchase these fragrances at significantly reduced prices.

articles.title: Seven of the best flowers available to buy with delivery in time for Valentine's Day
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Several companies, including Not On The High Street, Bloom & Wild, Prestige Flowers, Next, and Marks and Spencer, are offering flower bouquets for Valentine's and Galentine's Day.  Amazon features Eternal Petals real roses that last a year, and Lego offers Botanical Roses as a unique, never-die flower option.

articles.title: YOU Broadband Launches High-Speed Internet Plans in Pune City at Unbeatable Prices
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: YOU Broadband has launched new competitively priced broadband plans in Pune, starting at Rs. 799 for 300 Mbps and Rs. 999 for 500 Mbps. These plans are designed for streaming, gaming, and remote work, with incentives for longer subscriptions and combo packages including over 27 OTT apps.

articles.title: Ninja Swirl: Turning Your Kitchen into a Soft Serve Haven
articles.author: engadget
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl, a new addition to its Creami line, designed to create soft serve ice cream at home. The Swirl features a dedicated soft serve module, updated pint containers with a built-in nozzle, and optimized programs for improved consistency and quieter operation. It also offers enhanced capabilities for milkshakes, sorbets, gelatos, and various soft serve types.

articles.title: Papa Johns Releases Garlic Sauce Bath Bomb
articles.author: Simone
articles.summary: Papa Johns introduced a limited-edition Garlic Sauce Bath Bomb, inspired by their Special Garlic Dipping Sauce. The bath bomb is packaged in a dark green box and will be sent to selected super fans who share their love for Papa Johns' garlic sauce on social media.

articles.title: What is behind the ‘Harry Bōlz' madness? Elon Musk's name change on X sparks crypto frenzy
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Elon Musk's change of his X display name to "Harry Bōlz" caused the value of the cryptocurrency "Harry Bolz" to surge. Traders reacted rapidly, believing it could become the next Doge-like rally. This event underscores Musk's influence on cryptocurrency markets.

articles.title: The Pink Stuff The Miracle Cleaning Paste Recognized as a 2025 Product of the Year Award Winner
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff The Miracle Cleaning Paste, known for tackling stains without harsh chemicals, has won the 2025 Product of the Year Award in the Household Cleaning Essential Category. This recognition was determined by a national study of 40,000 shoppers in partnership with Kantar.

articles.title: This is why I love Circle to Search on the Galaxy S25 series
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 series features an updated version of "Circle to Search", originally launched on the Galaxy S24. The updated "Circle to Search" feature now supports audio recognition, allowing users to identify songs by humming or singing a tune. This new feature has been launched around the Pixel 9 launch.

articles.title: Tasting the past: Alberta scientist explains how the pull of nostalgia influences companies
articles.author: Cbc News
articles.summary: Coca-Cola launched an orange-cream version of its signature soda due to growing consumer demand for the flavor. The company aims to evoke nostalgia and capture the interest of consumers with this new product offering. The flavor development considers the balance of nostalgia and excitement.

articles.title: Pinkfish AI Launches Generative Automation, Redefining How Enterprises Automate at Scale
articles.author: Pinkfish
articles.summary: Pinkfish AI launched its Generative Automation platform, designed to enable anyone to create automations using natural language conversation. The platform combines an intuitive generative AI interface with enterprise-grade reliability, targeting users without coding experience.

articles.title: The Ninja Swirl by Creami is conquering the hardest type of ice cream to make at home
articles.author: Sam Rutherford
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Swirl by Creami, a new appliance that makes classic soft serve in addition to everything the original Creami could do. The Swirl is available from Ninja and third-party retailers like Amazon, Target, Best Buy and Kohl's for $350. It features improvements such as refined programs to reduce respinning and a modified Lite Ice Cream mode.

articles.title: Nextuple Inc. Announces the Launch of OnePint.ai: Revolutionizing Inventory Management with AI, Autonomous Decision-Making, and Simulations
articles.author: Nextuple
articles.summary: Nextuple Inc. has launched OnePint.ai, a new software company. OnePint.ai is dedicated to helping brands, retailers, and grocers optimize their inventory management through AI-driven decision-making and predictive simulations. It aims to replace fragmented, outdated systems with a modern, centralized inventory platform.

articles.title: Kinetic Business Launches Business Ready Internet Tailored to Small Businesses
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Kinetic Business launched Gener8, a platform designed to offer small businesses enhanced connectivity solutions, security options, and managed services. The platform aims to improve customer experience by optimizing internet and cybersecurity functionalities. Gener8 is designed to scale internet, connectivity, and security all in one place for businesses.

articles.title: Leveraging AI for faster and more effective personalization
articles.summary: Video services are leveraging AI to enhance personalization. Companies like Netflix utilize Machine Learning tools to provide relevant recommendations and personalize thumbnails. AI also optimizes streaming quality by monitoring network conditions and dynamically adjusting video quality.

articles.title: Revolution announce Gillette as new jersey sponsor entering 2025 season
articles.summary: Gillette and the Revolution are expanding their partnership with the launch of a new Revolution jersey featuring Gillette's logo. The launch includes augmented reality displays at Gillette Stadium and a public unveiling via a custom-wrapped Old Town Trolley touring Boston, offering fans the opportunity to buy the new jersey and receive giveaways.

articles.title: AI Tools for Digital Marketers: Boosting creativity, efficiency, and impact
articles.author: Olufemi Kazeem Oluoje
articles.summary: Several companies offer AI-powered tools and services that can be used for content creation, hyper-personalization, social media engagement, and customer service in the Nigerian digital marketing space. Jasper.ai and Copy.ai help create content in multiple languages, Canva Magic Design aids in visual creation, and ChatGPT-4 generates creative ideas. Additional tools such as Synthesia, Chatfuel, and Google's Voice Search Optimisation are introduced to enhance video ad creation, customer engagement, and voice search optimization, respectively.

articles.title: Why Live Events and Brand Activations Matter More Than Ever
articles.author: Nina Smith
articles.summary: Companies like Coca-Cola use campaigns such as 'Share a Coke' with live samples for consumer engagement. Vodafone partnered with Smyle at Wimbledon in 2024, offering charging stations and games. Nike launches footwear with influencer collaborations, amplifying new product reach through sports legends and event exclusivity.

articles.title: Flora Announces Appointment of Patrick Moloney as Head of Product Development for Vessel
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Flora Growth Corp. has appointed Patrick Moloney as Head of Product Development for its accessory brand, Vessel. Moloney's role is to drive innovation, enhance product quality, and strengthen Vessel's market position, implying new product developments and updates. This appointment is intended to grow Vessel's product offerings and expand into new markets.

articles.title: Bynder Accelerates AI Innovation by Expanding Bynder Labs With a New Team of Experts
articles.author: Manisha Mehta
articles.summary: Bynder Labs, Bynder's innovation program, has introduced new AI-driven features like Natural Language Search and Duplicate Manager to its DAM platform. The company provides a dedicated website, labs.bynder.com, to showcase current AI capabilities like Face Recognition and future AI developments, including an interactive forum for AI ideation and thought leadership.

articles.title: New Zburger coming downtown
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: Zburger is opening a new location in the National Association of Realtors building at New Jersey and F NW. The location was formerly occupied by Billy Goat. The opening date is yet to be announced.

articles.title: Get a $299 Nespresso bundle with a milk frother for just $135… plus a FREE $20 coffee voucher: 'This is the best coffee I have ever tasted in my life'
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Nespresso is offering the Evoluo and Aeroccino3 Bundle at a discounted price, including a box of 12 bonus capsules and a milk frother. The Nespresso Evoluo uses Centrifusion and barcode technology to brew espresso and coffee, while the Aeroccino3 creates froth for cappuccinos and lattes.

articles.title: How to initiate a return on Meesho app in seconds
articles.summary: Meesho app provides a hassle-free return process for users. Customers can initiate returns for wrong items, defective products, or if they change their minds. The return process includes steps from finding orders to preparing the product for pickup.

articles.title: Baileys at lowest price since Christmas in deal better than Tesco, Sainsbury's and Morrisons
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Customers review Baileys Original Irish Cream Liqueur, praising its rich, creamy texture and distinctive blend of Irish whiskey and cream. The product receives positive feedback for packaging and value, though some find it too sweet in cocktails. Some suggest cheaper alternatives.

articles.title: New Ninja Swirl™ by CREAMi® is the Next Generation of Enjoying Frozen Treats on Your Countertop
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SharkNinja, Inc. has launched the Ninja Swirl™ by CREAMi®, offering consumers two ways to enjoy frozen desserts: scoop or swirl.

articles.title: Vertiv Announces Global Launch of Liquid Cooling Services Portfolio to Support Systems for AI and High-Density Compute Applications
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Vertiv has launched Vertiv Liquid Cooling Services, which aims to help customers enhance system availability and improve efficiency. The service is now available globally.

articles.title: Thread by @_toddanderson on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: Cascade Web Solutions enhanced their SEO strategy, yielding a 300% SERP traffic growth for their clients. They optimized location pages, internal linking, and service pages for local relevance, while also improving the website's UI/UX to boost user engagement.

articles.title: ‘Check the Label' app lets Canadians scan to check if products are made in Canada
articles.author: Chris Hogg
articles.summary: Punchcard Systems launched 'Check the Label,' a free mobile app for Canadians to verify product origins by scanning barcodes. The app, available on Android and coming soon to iOS, leverages AI and crowdsourced data to determine if a product qualifies as 'Made in Canada' or 'Product of Canada,' aiming to provide consumers with transparent purchasing information.

articles.title: Unity Scents Launches Revolutionary Oil-Based Perfumes, Challenging Industry Norms
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Unity Scents is relaunching its fragrance brand globally, featuring a roll-on applicator designed to reduce waste and provide a personal fragrance experience. The brand's formulas are free from harmful chemicals and based on organic jojoba oil. Unity Scents is also inviting community members to co-create new fragrances by sharing personal stories.

articles.title: Sky Glass Gen 2 Unveiled: Immersive Sound, Brighter Display, and New Colors
articles.author: engadget
articles.summary: Sky has launched Sky Glass Gen 2, the successor to the original Sky Glass TV. The new generation features upgraded audio with a seven-speaker Dolby Atmos system, enhanced visuals with a brighter 4K Quantum Dot display, and a redesigned stand. It is available in three new colors and various sizes.

articles.title: Reasons a Hair Dryer is the Ideal Gift for the Modern Man
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: Dyson offers a range of sonic hair dryers designed for men, which combines innovation and top-tier technology. These hair dryers are for effortless styling and professional results.

articles.title: Zoom Phone now available in Chennai
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Zoom Communications has launched its Zoom Phone service in Chennai, India. This expansion builds upon the previous launch in the Maharashtra Telecom Circle and aims to provide telephony solutions for multinational and homegrown companies. The Zoom Phone service includes features enhanced by Zoom AI Companion, such as post-call summaries and voicemail prioritization.

articles.title: Made in Canada: Rocky Mountain Soap now at Saskatoon's Midtown Plaza
articles.author: Don Rice
articles.summary: Rocky Mountain Soap, specializing in natural personal care products, has opened a new store in Saskatoon as part of a rebrand initiative following COVID. The new store showcases updated brand identity, visuals, packaging, and store design, marking the beginning of more changes to come as the brand evolves.

articles.title: This Is Why I Choose Galaxy AI Over Gemini
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Samsung launched Galaxy AI in early 2024, integrating it into apps like Samsung Gallery and Samsung Notes. Galaxy AI features include object removal from pictures, voice recording transcription, and website summarization. The AI is designed to be a functional tool, different from a chatbot, and Samsung allows users to customize and ignore the AI features if desired.

articles.title: N-able's Adlumin MDR Thwarts Cyberattack within Hours of Deployment at Ventnor City, NJ
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: N-able partner, Ventnor City, New Jersey, successfully thwarted a cyberattack within hours of engaging the Adlumin Managed Detection and Response (MDR) solution. The Adlumin MDR is a product of N-able.

articles.title: Q2 FY25 Results: Mytheresa Reports Strong Net Sales Growth of 13% and Continued Strong Adjusted EBITDA Profitability in the Second Quarter
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Mytheresa launched an augmented reality shopping feature for iOS devices using ARKit. This feature allows customers to visualize items in their spaces before purchase. This provides more information for customers when they are buying a product.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5 to launch on February 20: Expected features, design and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Oppo will launch its next-generation foldable phone, the Find N5, in global markets and China on February 20. Alongside the Find N5, the company will also launch the Oppo Watch X2 in China. The Find N5 will be available in three color options and is expected to feature Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, up to 16GB of RAM, 512GB of storage, and a triple rear camera setup.

articles.title: AR and VR will transform the way we consume content: Vinit Karnik
articles.author: Akansha Srivastava
articles.summary: Asian Paints is utilizing AR and VR technologies to allow customers to visualize how different paint colors will look in their living rooms, enhancing the shopping experience. This implementation of mixed reality and immersive technology demonstrates innovation in marketing within the home improvement sector, facilitated by advancements in AR and VR devices.

articles.title: AI in customer experience: The future of engagement
articles.author: Sarah Dunsby
articles.summary: AI, particularly through chatbots, is transforming customer service by offering 24/7 availability, faster response times, and personalized interactions. These AI-driven solutions integrate seamlessly across various channels and improve accuracy and consistency in support, enhancing the overall customer experience. The article also gives a pointer on how to build a chatbot in Kommo.

articles.title: Omagh bombing survivor tells inquiry he placed sheets over victims' bodies
articles.author: Jonathan Mccambridge
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000 with a voucher code. Cult Beauty provides a 15% discount on orders over £25 using a discount code. ASOS offers 10% off first orders over £20 with a promo code. Travelodge gives 5% off bookings with a discount code. Currys has a tablet sale with at least 30% off, including iPads.

articles.title: 'Fast-drying' ghd hair dryer that 'smooths hair like no other' plummets in flash offer
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Ghd Air Hair Dryer is on flash sale at Amazon for £89.99, featuring a 2,100W motor and frizz-free finish. Shark's FlexStyle Sparkle sees a £30 reduction, now at £269.99, including multiple attachments, while Boots offers Drybar's Buttercup Blow-Dryer for £139, boasting a powerful motor and Ionic Technology.

articles.title: ‘Limited time' Google Pixel deal sees Android smartphone price slashed by 43 percent
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal on the Google Pixel 8, originally released in 2023. The phone, upgradeable to Android 15, features AI-powered call screening and photo editing capabilities. Google plans to support the phone with software updates until 2030.

articles.title: M&S shoppers praise 'silky and soft' bedding set that 'looks more expensive'
articles.author: Nadia Breen
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer's 'Aida-Alouette Damask Sateen Bedding Set' is gaining popularity for its elegant design and quality, priced from £39.50 to £69. M&S customers praise its soft texture and convenient zip fastening. Alternative damask bedding sets are available at Dunelm, Next, and Amazon.

articles.title: The Future of Laundry in Pakistan: How Jab Chaho is Setting the Trend for Online & In-Store Services
articles.author: Samra Nisar
articles.summary: Jab Chaho is launching a laundry service in Pakistan, blending technology with traditional methods. Customers can access services via an app or visit a physical store for dry cleaning, tailoring, and sneaker cleaning. The company offers online scheduling, doorstep delivery, and express services.

articles.title: No Code & Digital Transformation: a Match Made in Heaven?
articles.author: Gordana V
articles.summary: My Nursery, Blaze Stack, Plannly, UserLoop, and Dwellos leverage no-code platforms to provide digital solutions for childcare management, fire investigation, healthcare scheduling, customer feedback, and home management. These applications offer streamlined operations and automated features, demonstrating the practical benefits of no-code technology in various sectors. DAZZM provides deeper understanding of No Code and its practical applications.

articles.title: Saleeman Adedoyin Revolutionizes Retail Tech with Innovative Solutions to Persistent Challenges
articles.author: Agnes Ekebuike
articles.summary: TechRetail Solutions, led by Saleeman Adedoyin, has launched RetailSync, an AI and blockchain-integrated platform, designed to streamline retail operations. RetailSync offers real-time data synchronization, enhancing inventory management, reducing operational costs, and improving customer experience. It also includes a training program aimed at equipping retail staff with digital skills.

articles.title: A new era of eco-friendly pool maintenance with Beatbot AquaSense 2 robotic pool cleaners
articles.author: Atharva Gosavi
articles.summary: Beatbot launched the AquaSense 2 series of robotic pool cleaners, featuring AI-driven cleaning, sustainable design, and an eco-friendly clarifier. Beatbot also introduced the Amphibious RoboTurtle, designed for ecological research and disaster response, unveiled at CES 2025.

articles.title: Dyson unveils innovative wet and dry vacuum cleaner
articles.author: MAARIV ONLINE
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the WashG1, a new device that combines vacuuming and floor washing. The WashG1 features automatic separation of dry dirt from dirty water and offers three levels of wash intensity, along with a MAX mode for stubborn stains. The WashG1 will be available for purchase in Israel for 3,290 NIS.

articles.title: Premium cannabis in Thailand now available at groundbreaking prices
articles.author: Selman Demirdoven
articles.summary: Cannabis-Deal introduces premium-quality popcorn buds at a revolutionary price of 25 baht per gramme in Thailand. This initiative aims to make high-grade marijuana accessible to everyone, challenging inflated prices in the current market. The company provides convenient online ordering and delivery service throughout Thailand.

articles.title: 22 Things From Nordstrom You Shouldn't Wait Until Your Birthday To Treat Yourself To
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: Maison Margiela introduces Replica Lazy Sunday Morning candle, offering a lower-priced way to experience the brand's scents. Dyson launches the Super Sonic hair dryer, promising fast drying without heat damage. Quip releases a rechargeable water flosser with an aesthetically pleasing design. Hatch introduces Restore 2, combining a bedside light, sunrise alarm, and sound machine with a wind-down setting. Smeg presents a retro-chic mini electric kettle, for kitchen aesthetic improvements.

articles.title: Simple One Gen 1.5 review: Improved range and ride dynamics
articles.author: Sabyasachi Dasgupta
articles.summary: Simple Energy launched Simple One Gen 1.5 at ₹1.67 lakh (ex-showroom). The product features the highest range in its segment and represents an improved version of the previous model.

articles.title: Myntra Fashion Carnival Sale: Indulge in Luxurious Body Washes
articles.summary: Pears introduces a gentle formula body wash enriched with pure glycerin, designed for deep moisturization and cleansing. The collection includes various body washes, such as an illuminating shimmer body wash infused with lavender and Vitamin C, a Vitamin E-infused exfoliating body wash, and other refreshing gels, each offering unique benefits for the skin.

articles.title: Hyundai Livart is launching a curation service that uses artificial intelligence (AI) to recommend p..
articles.author: Lee Yu-jin
articles.summary: Hyundai Livart is launching an AI-powered curation service within Livart Mall to provide personalized product recommendations and content. The service analyzes customer preferences, purchase history, and search history to suggest relevant products, promotions, and interior design content, offering a customized shopping experience.

articles.title: 'Bright and beautiful' Next £28 floral shirt is perfect paired with slim trousers
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is offering a Pink Floral Print Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt. The shirt features statement buttons and various prints including abstract blue, brown floral, orange spot, and orange/pink abstract. Reviews highlight the shirt's bright colors, comfortable style, ease of care, and versatility.

articles.title: Samsung vs. LG: The Energy Efficiency Showdown in Washer-Dryers
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Bespoke AI Combo washer-dryer, which the Korea Consumer Agency found to consume 1,160Wh per cycle, 23% less power than LG Electronics' Tromm Objet Collection Wash Combo that consumes 1,432Wh. Additionally, the Bespoke AI Combo completes washing and drying cycles up to 30 minutes faster than LG's product.

articles.title: Juicy Curls Announces Revolutionary Two-Step System to Simplify Curl Care
articles.summary: Juicy Curls has launched a new two-step curl care system that replaces six traditional products. Designed for hydration, frizz control, and definition, the system is now available for purchase online through the company's website and Amazon. This simplifies curl care routines by addressing consumer frustration with over-complicated product choices.

articles.title: Open Weight Definition Aims to Prevent Open Source AI 'Open Washing' at AI Action Summit
articles.summary: The Open Source Alliance (OSA) introduced the Open Weight Definition (OWD) at the AI Action Summit. This framework aims to provide clear guidelines for AI models lacking full reproducibility, such as training data, distinguishing them from Open Source AI and preventing 'open washing'. The OWD allows free use and distribution but may lack the transparency for full reproducibility.

articles.title: New Galaxy S25 Edge leak sheds light on Samsung's slim flagship
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: A leak reveals details about the Galaxy S25 Edge. This suggests potential updates or features for a new product from the Galaxy/Samsung line.

articles.title: AI vs. Human Creativity: Striking the Perfect Balance in Modern Marketing
articles.author: Nick Mwangi
articles.summary: AI-powered email marketing tools and predictive analytics help tailor promotional messages and determine optimal ad times. Spotify's 'Wrapped' feature exemplifies the effective combination of AI data tracking and human creativity to generate engaging and shareable content, enhancing user experience and brand visibility. Such synergy allows companies to connect with audiences on a personal level.

articles.title: Denmark Makes Epic Troll Joke About Buying California, by Andrew Anglin
articles.author: The Unz Review
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT, an AI product, is being promoted as the best and most efficient on the market.

articles.title: Need a new vacuum? These 3 will transform how you clean
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Roborock is launching new robot vacuum products, including the Roborock Saros 10, Saros 10R, and F25 Series. The Saros 10 features a thin design, RetractSense Navigation, and VibraRise 4.0 Mopping System, while the Saros 10R includes StarSight Autonomous System 2.0. The F25 series offers wet-dry cleaning with JawScrapers technology. These products are available with discounts from February 10-16.

articles.title: Need a new vacuum? These 3 will transform how you clean
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: The article discusses three vacuum cleaner models aimed at transforming cleaning practices. These vacuums offer novel solutions for improving cleaning efficiency and effectiveness. Details on specific brands or model names are necessary to fully assess the relevance to product launches.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (2) Review: A Design-First, Mid-Range Challenger
articles.author: Dean Blake
articles.summary: The Nothing Phone (2) is reviewed as a solid mid-range phone with a distinctive design. The phone's software includes unique widgets and a pop-up app view. Nothing is expected to launch the Phone (3a) and fully-featured Phone (3).

articles.title: How China's Geely is making its EVs fit for Australian roads
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Geely is launching its namesake brand in Australia. The company is debuting a model suited for Australian conditions.

articles.title: OMD Worldwide reinvents itself with 'We create what's next' brand refresh
articles.summary: OMD Worldwide has launched a new brand positioning, "We Create What's Next," to emphasize its commitment to helping brands in a dynamic environment. This refresh includes leveraging cutting-edge technology and strategic expertise. OMD has secured major client additions including Gap Inc., Michelin, AliExpress, and Turkish Airlines.

articles.title: 20,000+ Amazon Shoppers Just Snagged This Spin Scrubber That Cuts ‘Cleaning Time in Half,' and It's on Sale
articles.author: Toni Sutton
articles.summary: Tuyu has launched its Electric Spin Scrubber on Amazon. The scrubber features multiple brush attachments and two cleaning speeds for various surfaces. It is praised for its convenience, efficiency, and ability to reduce cleaning time and effort.

articles.title: The Ninja Swirl by CREAMi is finally dropping soon. Here's how you can be one of the first to snag it
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja is launching the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi on February 11th at NinjaKitchen.com for $350. This new soft serve twist on the CREAMi ice cream maker includes 13 one-touch programs, 6 soft serve options, and a CreamiFit program for creating high-protein ice cream.

articles.title: Just 38 Products That'll Give You Heart Eyes — It Is Valentine Season, After All
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article presents a curated selection of recently launched or noteworthy products available for purchase.  Highlights include L'Oréal Paris Makeup True Match Lumi Glotion for its illuminating effect, NeeDoh "Dream Drop" fidget toy by Schylling, Elizabeth Mott's Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask for skin detoxification, and a variety of other items ranging from home goods like Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows and Otherland candles to personal accessories like Pavoi rings and Lawless's "Forget The Filler" lip treatment. Several featured items are from small businesses like Caitlyn Minimalist and Cooking Gift Set.

articles.title: China's Leapmotor launches $20,000 smart EV, after BYD cuts entry price
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Leapmotor launched its new electric vehicle, the B10, equipped with lidar and urban traffic smart driving capability, with pre-sale starting March 10. This launch follows BYD's introduction of advanced autonomous driving features on several models, initiating a potential price war in the smart EV market.

articles.title: China's Leapmotor launches $20,000 smart EV, after BYD cuts entry price
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Leapmotor launched the B10, a new electric vehicle featuring lidar and urban traffic smart driving capability, with pre-sales beginning March 10. BYD has also begun offering advanced autonomous driving features on most of its models.

articles.title: DS should consider its past while shaping its future
articles.author: Matt Prior
articles.summary: DS aims to become a luxury automotive brand, aspiring to be the 'Louis Vuitton of the automotive industry.' The design director acknowledges this is a long-term goal, possibly taking another 10 years. The upcoming N°8 crossover's interior is described as being more akin to Bentley than its German competitors.

articles.title: Amazon knocked $75 off the Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe so you can kick your Dunkin' habit
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: The user replaced their daily Dunkin' or Starbucks routine with the Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe machine after receiving it as a Christmas gift. The user is now using Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe to start their day.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Tipped to Get a 3,900mAh Battery
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone at its recent Galaxy Unpacked event. The Galaxy S25 Edge is a new product, however its launch is still far away.

articles.title: aiPump launches its first DeFAI product – Newton, the virtual AI assistant
articles.author: Coin Gape
articles.summary: aiPump launched Newton, its first DeFAI product, which is an AI agent creation platform designed to make DeFi accessible without coding skills. The launch follows aiPump's entry into the Chinese Web3 market.

articles.title: Deliveroo partners Sheng Siong to expand grocery delivery services
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Sheng Siong offers over 5,000 products for purchase.

articles.title: Starbucks' New At-Home Coffee Is an Instant Game Changer
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new line of retail products featuring three varieties. This is a first-of-its-kind offering from the company.

articles.title: Zebronics Zeb Pods O: Indulge Unboxing
articles.author: Farhaan Tipu
articles.summary: Zebronics is launching or has launched its new product, Zebronics Zeb Pods O, which is being unboxed.
